title: Game Progress Route
content:
the man's name is Andrick, and the dying dwarf on the ground is Edowin.

When you first approach them, Brynna will be suspicious of you and you'll have four dialogue options to choose from:

Freeze and hold up your hands What happened to your friend? [MEDICINE] His wounds look deep. I might be able to help. [ILLITHID] [WISDOM] I will go where where I wish.

If you attempt the Medicine Check, you'll have to pass a DC of 10. If you choose any of the first three options, even if you fail your Medic
